alternative_parents.description: Organic aromatic compounds that contain a naphthalene moiety that carries a sulfonic acid group (or a derivative thereof) at the 2-position. Naphthalene is a bicyclic compound that is made up of two fused benzene ring.
alternative_parents.name: 2-naphthalene sulfonic acids and derivatives

alternative_parents.description: An arylsulfonic acid carrying the sulfonic acid group at the 1-position, and no substitute at the 2-position of the aromatic ring.
alternative_parents.name: 1-sulfo,2-unsubstituted aromatic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a phenylhydrazide moiety, which consists of a hydrazide substituent attached to a phenyl group.
alternative_parents.name: Phenylhydrazines

alternative_parents.description: Organoarsenic compounds containing an arsenic compound that is pentasubstituted by only organic groups.
alternative_parents.name: Pentaorganoarsanes

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing the sulfonyl group, with the general structure RS(=O)2R' ( R,R' must not be H).
alternative_parents.name: Sulfonyls

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing the sulfonic acid group, which has the general structure RS(=O)2OH (R is not a hydrogen atom).
alternative_parents.name: Organosulfonic acids

alternative_parents.description: Organoarsenic compounds that containing a sulfur atom.
alternative_parents.name: Sulfur-containing organoarsenic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organoarsenic compounds that containing an oxygen atom.
alternative_parents.name: Oxygen-containing organoarsenic compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic salt compounds containing a metalloid atom in its ionic form.
alternative_parents.name: Organic metalloid salts

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing an N-Alkylidene derivative of hydrazine. They have the generic structure RNN=C(R')R\" (R,R',R\"= H or organyl group).
alternative_parents.name: Hydrazones

alternative_parents.description: Compounds containing a bond between carbon a pnictogen atom. Pnictogens are p-block element atoms that are in the group 15 of the periodic table.
alternative_parents.name: Organopnictogen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing a bond between a carbon atom and an oxygen atom.
alternative_parents.name: Organooxygen compounds

alternative_parents.description: Organic compounds containing an oxide group.
alternative_parents.name: Organic oxides

alternative_parents.description: Derivatives of hydrocarbons obtained by substituting one or more carbon atoms by an heteroatom. They contain at least one carbon atom and heteroatom.
alternative_parents.name: Hydrocarbon derivatives

class.description: Compounds containing a naphthalene moiety, which consists of two fused benzene rings.
class.name: Naphthalenes

description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as 2-naphthalene sulfonates. These are organic aromatic compounds that contain a naphthalene moiety that carries a sulfonic acid group at the 2-position. Naphthalene is a bicyclic compound that is made up of two fused benzene ring.

direct_parent.description: Organic aromatic compounds that contain a naphthalene moiety that carries a sulfonic acid group at the 2-position. Naphthalene is a bicyclic compound that is made up of two fused benzene ring.
direct_parent.name: 2-naphthalene sulfonates

intermediate_nodes.description: Organic aromatic compounds that contain a naphthalene moiety that carries a sulfonic acid group at one or more positions. Naphthalene is a bicyclic compound that is made up of two fused benzene ring.
intermediate_nodes.name: Naphthalene sulfonates

kingdom.description: Compounds that contain at least one carbon atom, excluding isocyanide/cyanide and their non-hydrocarbyl derivatives, thiophosgene, carbon diselenide, carbon monosulfide, carbon disulfide, carbon subsulfide, carbon monoxide, carbon dioxide, Carbon suboxide, and dicarbon monoxide.
kingdom.name: Organic compounds

subclass.description: Organic aromatic compounds that contain a naphthalene moiety that carries a sulfonic acid group (or a derivative thereof) at one or more positions. Naphthalene is a bicyclic compound that is made up of two fused benzene ring.
subclass.name: Naphthalene sulfonic acids and derivatives

superclass.description: Aromatic compounds containing one or more benzene rings.
superclass.name: Benzenoids
